name: In The Dark (Chapter 1)
description:
Darkiplier is chasing a young man who suffers from amnesia. When this somebody stumbles into Detective Abe, can the two of them survive this strange world together and uncover the mysteries that lie in their pasts?

NOTE: Chapter one of the game has been released, with two and three due for 2020. Current gameplay time is 2-3 hours. This IS a horror game with heavy themes (not like, Outlast heavy, more like The Crooked Man heavy) and is not intended for young children.

THIS IS A FANGAME. I am not an associate of Markiplier or any such awesomefolks or their content. I made this for me and whoever else wanna play.

If you're interested in helping with the development of future chapters, check out this survey I made for the beta testers:
